titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to permit as part of certain highway projects the installation of charging infrastructure for plug-in electric drive vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: 11/3/2011--Introduced. Includes as an eligible project under specified federal-aid highway programs the installation of plug-in electric drive vehicle charging infrastructure at fringe and corridor parking facilities.
